derivation: from an unused root (meaning to be tender);
outline:
1. fresh, young barley ears, barley
  2. month of ear-forming, of greening of crop, of growing green Abib, month of exodus and passover (March or April)
kjv_def: Abib, ear, green ears of corn (not maize).
strongs_def: green, i.e. a young ear of grain; hence, the name of the month Abib or Nisan
